name: Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games
summary: These games were made in the 80s on a Commodore 64, using Palace Software's Shoot'Em Up Construction Kit. Sloany made these back when he was about 11 or 12. The tapes were found some years later & preserved for posterity as TAP files.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Commodore 64 =+ Sloany Vs Reggie += Long play
